short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReviewStudio Extension - improves review of live websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReviewStudio is used to proof visual media including web sites. Users leave comments and annotations in context of the visual media. This can be tricky with dynamic web sites where the visual context can change because of transitions, interaction, etc. This extension allows ReviewStudio to make screenshots of a web site as it is during proofing and use those screenshots as a consistent reference of the comments and annotations. Chrome does not allow web sites direct access to the browser screenshot API, but Chrome extensions can access it. This ReviewStudio Chrome extension works in tandem with the ReviewStudio web site to create a screenshot of the web site that is being proofed when a user wants to add a comment and annotation.
